name: The World's Hardest PC Game
description:
Can you take the challenge and take on the 30 amazing levels on the worlds hardest PC game.

30 levels
Live death counter
Easy controls

The worlds hardest PC game can be done in one life.

Average death count are between 60 - 150.

Follow me on TWITTER

Please leave a comment and what you think of my remake of the worlds hardest game. This is my first full game i have created.
